review: 생활사박물관 아주 토속적이고 친근한 생활소품들을 소장하고 있는 곳입니다. 딱히 박물관이라고 하기에는 조금 실망할수도 있을거에요.그냥 한번 둘러보기에 좋아요. 북촌에 있으니 전망대나 고즈넉한 산책을 즐기다가 그냥 들러볼만한 곳.
review_en: It is a place that has very traditional and friendly living items in the Museum of Life History. You might be a little disappointed to call it a museum.It's just good to look around. It is located in Bukchon, so you can enjoy the observatory or a quiet walk and just stop by.
